name: Dune Rider
description:
Dune Rider is racing game  set in the desert.

Take control of special vehicle design to race on dunes and sands called "Speeder" with ability to rewind time.

Enjoy nice graphics and cool soundtrack.

Try out your skill as driver in 3 different game modes:

- Time Trial 

- Nitro Run

- Package Collecting

You can play in browser but i recommend to download game.
